template.name: ,vpNotEmpty
template.description: @NotEmpty Spring Parameter Validation (applied to Text -> not null or whitespace)

template.name: ,vpNotBlank
template.description: @NotBlank Spring Parameter Validation (applied to String, Collection, Map or Array values)

template.name: ,vpPositive
template.description: @Positive Spring Parameter Validation (applied to Numeric values)

template.name: ,vpPositiveOrZero
template.description: @PositiveOrZero Spring Parameter Validation (applied to Numeric values)

template.name: ,vpNegative
template.description: @Negative Spring Parameter Validation (applied to Numeric values)

template.name: ,vpNegativeOrZero
template.description: @NegativeOrZero Spring Parameter Validation (applied to Numeric values)

template.name: ,vpPast
template.description: @Past Spring Parameter Validation (applied to Java 8 or older dates)

template.name: ,vpPastOrPresent
template.description: @PastOrPresent Spring Parameter Validation (applied to Java 8 or older dates)

template.name: ,vpFuture
template.description: @Future Spring Parameter Validation (applied to Java 8 or older dates)

template.name: ,vpFutureOrPresent
template.description: @FutureOrPresent Spring Parameter Validation (applied to Java 8 or older dates)
